cards.name: Automaton
cards.description: Socialist Robot: When played, give +1 HP to all allied units, gain -1 HP per unit.

cards.name: 501st Clone trooper
cards.description: Unlimited Carry Strength: This unit can carry 3 equipment.

cards.name: Minecraft Player
cards.description: Unlimited Carry Strength: This unit can carry 3 equipment.

cards.name: Rasputin
cards.description: Lady’s Man: All allied female units gain +1 HP and all enemy female units gain -1 HP. If female unit is destroyed by “Lady’s Man”, Rasputin gain +1 HP.

cards.name: The Helldiver
cards.description: Democracy Protects: When first destroyed remove card from play then put card back in hand start of next turn.

cards.name: Daemonbreath Spear
cards.description: Wardog Bullshit: Roll a D6, if result is a 6 deal a additional 3 damage when unit attacks. Effects: +2 AK.

cards.name: James Workshop
cards.description: Overpriced Minis: The enemy player gains one less PT on the start of their next turn.

cards.name: R.E.P.O Bot
cards.description: Repossession: Play this card immediately after the enemy has played a consumable or equipment. Roll a D3. On a 3 ignore all effects from said card and use it’s ability for yourself. On a 1-2, this card does nothing.

cards.name: Counterspell
cards.description: I CAST COUNTERSPELL: If enemy plays a consumable targeting one of your units, negate its ability. Can be used at any time.

cards.name: Jimbo
cards.description: Jimbo: +4 HP or AK to any selected unit.

cards.name: Fireball
cards.description: Fireball: Deals 3 Damage to select unit, if there are more than 3 units in play deal 1 damage to every unit, including yours.

cards.name: Dr Pepper
cards.description: Dr of the Peps: Choose one of your units to gain +1 hp and +1 attack damage for 2 rounds.

cards.name: Scattergun
cards.description: When weapon is equipped to a unit the unit needs to roll a D6 every time they attack. If the unit rolls a 6, deal double damage otherwise deal the unit’s base damage.

cards.name: Backyard
cards.description: Any unit card with the Phineas and Ferb logo will gain +2 HP while this card is in effect.

cards.name: Goomba
cards.description: Mushroom? Rat? Who knows: When played stun the lowest PT valued enemy unit and this card.

cards.name: Baseline Earth
cards.description: Any unit card with the Phineas and Ferb logo will gain +2 HP while this card is in effect.
